about_the_game:
Space Fishing offers an incredible gaming experience, providing a unique adventure in the boundless depths of space. Embark on a journey among asteroids with your own personal spacecraft and explore different galaxies. Challenge yourself by catching various species of fish that inhabit the depths of space.

The game presents various challenges and tasks to master the art of fishing. Additionally, each successful catch will earn you unique rewards, helping you advance your space fishing career.

For space adventure and fishing enthusiasts alike, Space Fishing delivers an exceptional experience. Join Space Fishing today to embark on a journey among asteroids with your own spacecraft and uncover the mysteries of deep space!


Some Features:

Expansive Exploration Areas: Travel between different areas to discover new species and expand your explorations.

Customizable Spacecraft: Customize your spacecraft with various upgrades and equipment to enhance your fishing skills and catch more fish.

Innovative Fishing Mechanics: Use lasers to temporarily paralyze fish and make them easier to catch. These innovative mechanics enrich your space fishing experience.

Dialogue System: Deepen the game's interactions by engaging with characters.

Variety of Fish Species: Catch and expand your collection with various fish species such as Marlin, Archerfish, Barracuda, Manta Ray, and more.

Missions and Rewards: Progress in your space fishing career by completing challenging missions and earning special rewards. Missions enhance the depth and replayability of the game.

name: Space Fishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Space Fishing: Explore, catch, win! Are you ready for a unique fishing experience in space? Explore different regions with your custom spaceship, catch exotic fish, and win unique rewards. An unmissable experience for space adventure enthusiasts!
